Package BobcatLib.Logging.FaultsAndErrors

Class Pigeon2Faults

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Logging.FaultsAndErrors.Pigeon2Faults
All Implemented Interfaces:
FaultsWrapper
public class Pigeon2Faults extends Object implements FaultsWrapper
Manages and monitors faults for the Pigeon2 IMU device. This class provides alerts for various fault conditions that can occur during the operation of the Pigeon2 IMU.

    • detect_fault

      public boolean detect_fault(boolean faultTest, Alert alert, Alert.AlertType alertType)
      Checks if a specific fault condition is true and triggers an alert if so.
      Parameters:
      faultTest - The fault condition to evaluate.
      alert - The alert to activate if the fault condition is true.
      alertType - The severity level for the alert.
      Returns:
      true if the fault condition is true; otherwise, false.

    • hasFaultOccured

      public boolean hasFaultOccured()
      Checks if any fault has occurred for the Pigeon2 IMU. If faults are detected, corresponding alerts are activated.
      Specified by:
      hasFaultOccured in interface FaultsWrapper
      Returns:
      true if at least one fault is detected; otherwise, false.
